input.command:
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/translate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"hello","sourceLang":"auto","targetLang":"es"}' &
CURL_PID=$!
sleep 2
tail -5 dev.log
kill $CURL_PID 2>/dev/null
input.description: Test API call and check logs immediately
